_header: Love is out of land I-went
_description: On the Evils of the Time — seven lines preceded by Latin version

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Loue is out of lond i-wentDefaute of loue þis lond haþ
                    shentReuthþe and treuthþe and chariteGoþ out of lond
                    all þreoPrude enuye and lecherieCouetise and
                    tricherieHabbeþ þis lond one here baillye
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
EETS
         o.s. 15 (1866); repr. 1962; rev. ed. 1903: 228; rev. ed. 257.
